name: Substructure
description:
Theme of the Ludum Dare 45 was "Start with nothing" so i started with no knowledge of unity, and making 3D games from scratch!.

You could say that the game only lasts around 54 secounds, and it seem unfinished. (well to be honest, it is unfinished)

but I'm quite happy with the results. I had good time making it, and I want to learn more about it in the future.

So see you at the next Ludum Dare!
